       :   This is the ultimate authority in learning to count blackjack :
           it has mediocre graphics and horrible audio, but if you have
           ever wanted to learn to count cards, this is the software for
           you. Even recommended by the MIT Team made famous in "21"

           Casino VÃƒÆ’Ã‚Â©ritÃƒÆ’Ã‚Â© Windows Blackjack software products for card 
           counting, basic strategy, shuffle tracking and Ace prediction. 
           The major aim in the construction of these tools is the 
           accurate simulation of play in a live casino. In particular, 
           ultra-real casino Blackjack card counting. Although Casino 
           VÃƒÆ’Ã‚Â©ritÃƒÆ’Ã‚Â© products can be played as Blackjack games, they were 
           designed as serious casino practice tools for novices and 
           professionals. Casino VÃƒÆ’Ã‚Â©ritÃƒÆ’Ã‚Â© has long been considered the top 
           Blackjack software by nearly all experts including members of 
           the MIT Blackjack teams (see CV Blackjack References). See a 
           review at CV Blackjack Review.


           CHEATS:

           F12 = When you press this, just click on your chips or move 
                 them around a bit, you will notice each time you click
                 on a chip you get $100 bucks, great when you are running
                 a little low.
